full_text: Love what I saw from Austin Reeves this season. Lakers got another good one. #LakersNation
Frank Vogal wasn’t the problem. Rob Pelinka is the problem for letting a player dictate personnel moves. @Lakers can’t let LeGM run the team. LeWestbrook experiment was a complete bust.
What an amazing year. That offense was so exciting to watch. https://t.co/SEKyT37faL
